NUMBER OF YEARS IN THE PLAN
PENSION COMPUTER
For computation of future service
benefits under P A A Cooperative.
Retirement Income Plan
For computation of your approximate Future Service
Retirement Income from the Cooperative Retirement
Income Plan, move this slide so the opening is over
the number of years you will be in the Plan between
the date your membership began to Normal Retire:
ment Date. The figure opposite your estimated
average annual earnings while in the Plan will be your
approximate income from the Plan. Past Service
benefits and Social Security benefits will be in
addition to these. Turn Computer over for Social
Security benefits. If you are not eligible for Social
Security benefits, your income from the Plan will be
somewhat higher.
April 1, 1945
Prepared by
CONNECTICUT GENERAL LIFE INSURANCE COMPANY
HARTFORD
CONNICTiCUT
properties.sfomuseum:creditline: Gift of the Family of Captain Roger J. Sherron, Jr.
properties.sfomuseum:description: Pension calculator issued by Connecticut General Life Insurance Company branded with “Pan American Airways System” name and “PAA” single wing globe logo; movable plastic sleeve over numerical chart for computation of projected retirement income.
properties.wof:name: pension calculator: Connecticut General Life Insurance Company, Pan American Airways System
